landlord.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a man who rents a room, building, or piece of land to someone
landlord.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a man who owns or manages a pub
landlord.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a person or organization that owns land or buildings
landlord.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The newspaper is negotiating with its landlord to reduce its rent.
